```{r}
pred <- 
  read_delim("./../../data/visualization/performance/v02/alldb_single_v02_small_less_vjiyv06a_performance.tsv",
             col_names = c('y_true', 'y_pred', 'y_prob', 'logit_0', 'logit_1'))

y_true <-
  pred %>% 
  pull(y_true)

y_prob <-
  pred %>% 
  pull(y_prob)

```
```{r}
roc = roc(y_true, y_prob)
roc
```
